about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Emerald Tyre Manufacturers specializes in manufacturing, supplying, and servicing a wide range of tyres. The company offers its products under the brand name "GRECKSTER".

Emerald Tyre Manufacturers products are Solid Resilient Tyres, Press bands, Industrial Penumatic Tyres & Butyl Tubes & Flaps and Wheel Rims.

The company's products are being exported to global markets including, the USA, UAE, Russia, and major European Countries like Belgium, Germany, Netherlands, Hungry, Portugal, Italy, Denmark Poland besides the UK. The company also has warehouses located in Belgium, UAE and the USA providing on-time delivery of products and value-added services to customers across Europe, the Middle East and now in North America.

As of March 31 2024, The company had 224 permanent and 191 contractual employees.

Competitive Strength:

  1. Experienced and dedicated management team
  2. Manufacturing Facility to handle a wide range of off Highway Tyres
  3. Wide product range and customized product offering
  4. Diverse Customer Base
  5. Qualitative Products

faqs.question: What is the Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO is a SME IPO of 5185200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹49.26 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹95 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on December 5, 2024, and closes on December 9, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO opens on December 5, 2024 and closes on December 9, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO?
faqs.answer: Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,14,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 10, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, December 11, 2024. Check the Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Emerald Tyre Manufacturers IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 12, 2024.
